reviews.review: It's good in an infinite variety of ways.

I don't really write reviews, but I'm writing one for Infinite because it's just that good.  (Also, to get the Steam Awards badge).  With maybe 2 or 3 exceptions, this is the best-written game I have ever seen or played.  Elizabeth is, in my opinion, one of the most if not the most realistic and engaging character in gaming – especially considering she is solidly a secondary character.
Apart from that, everything about Infinite is just beautiful.  The atmosphere, the combat, the graphics; everything.  
"Will The Circle Be Unbroken?" is one of the most emotional renditions of a song I've heard yet; I cried hearing it before I even knew what happened in the game.  Seriously, if you only play one game – or if you aren't into games that much, or if you want to try video games – try this.  It [i]is[/i] worth it.
Incredible story. Play it again and again. Both me and the game are in the loop.
Unbelievable experience !

The shooter game which is mind-numbingly boring.

The "deep plot" game evey plot branch of which is ended so abruptly you could even miss them.

The "best AI companion ever" who boils down to "Booker, catch!"

The "best graphics and design" with 1.5 (one and a half) different faces for all NPCs in the game.

Um jogo sensacional, para encerrar com chave de ouro essa trilogia magnifica. Bioshock Infinite, assim como seus dois antecessores, não é apenas um jogo mas uma experiência de vida.

Não existem palavras para descrever a expêriencia que Bioshock Infinite proporciona! Simplesmente maravilhoso, envolvente, personagens carismáticos e com um roteiro de cair o queixo!

I KILLED MYSELF AND I HATE MYSELF, HAVE 2 OF MYSELF BUT ONLY 1 OF MY DAUGHTER, THATS MAKE NO SENSE

A terrific update from the first installment in the franchise.
To attemp to avoid spoilers, the plot is great.
The combat wonderfully uses the open-air atmosphere to create a badass, swashbuckling, free-running, mob-crushing
experience. Eaxh weapon and vigor is fun in its own unique way. For a franchise so famous for its story and charater development, the combat mechanics are terrific, giving it unexpected replay value.
Even on potato laptops, the game manages to be beautiful, with amazing use of at ospheric lighting and color palettes. The NPCs and little background quirks give Columbia a life of its own, adding incredible immersion. 
10/10.

ИГРА просто завораживает своей атмосферой, ее можно проходить не один раз, и каждый этот раз будет по-своему крут^_^ Советую всем!!!
Удивительная история, которая при первом прохождении дарит массу эмоций и дает богатую пищу для размышлений. Инфинит не самый лучший шутер, но сюжет и арт-дизайн игры впечатляют.

Ein absolutes Meisterwerk, das allein wegen seiner Story schon gespielt werden sollte. Die offene Welt verleitet dazu, viel erkunden zu wollen und auch über die Story hinaus Zeit in das Spiel zu investieren.
Die Steuerung ist meiner Meinung nach sehr gelungen, die Shooter Mechanik ist jedoch ein wenig gewöhnungsbedürftig.
Alles in allem, ein geniales Spiel!

Bioshock Infinite spielt in einer nahezu farbenfrohen Welt, die mich als Spieler öfters zum staunen gebracht hat. Nach wenigen Minuten Spielzeit merken wir, dass auf in der Wolkenstadt jedoch nichts mit Heiterkeit und Sonnenschein zugeht, wie man es äußerlich hätte vermuten können. Doch dass hätte sich unser Protagonist sich auch denken können, als er den Auftrag erhielt eine "Elisabeth" zu befreien. Diese begleitet uns fortan die meiste Zeit des Spiels, wobei sie mehr ist, als ein nerviges Anhängsel, bei derm wir den Babysitter spielen müssern. Sie gibt uns nütliche Hinweise, hilft uns gelegentlich mit Vorräten aus, wenn wir sie am dringensten benötigen.
Die Story ist solide, und das Gameplay funktioniert bis auf kleine Feinheiten ganz gut. In der zweiten Hälfte zieht das Spiel übrigens im Schwierigkeitsgrad nochmal an, aber wem dies zuviel sein sollte, der kann dies selbstverständlicvh noch einmal umstellen.

Alles in allem bietet Bioshock eibe wunderbare Spielerfahrung, die auch Einsteigern der Triologie eine Chance lässt.
9/10

Совершенная игра, новое слово, составленное из знакомых букв. Широкий шаг не только для серии BioShock, но для жанра в целом. И вроде бы мы все это видели в других играх, но в таком мастерском исполнении — еще никогда. Infinite бьет сразу во все точки — обжигает глаза красотой, занимает спинной мозг перестрелками, нагружает интеллект сюжетом и покоряет сердце открытостью Элизабет.
un mundo  genial lleno de sorpresas!!!

If you think that you have try all the possibile game, biohock infite will surprise you. If you play the old bioshock, you will have a lot of familiarity with the game. Depsite this the gameplay is not good as Bisohock 1,  i found it less difficult, but faster. The important thing of this game is the setting and the storytelling. The city of columbia will be one of your favouirte place, you feel it as it become real. About the story i couldn't say somenthing, it's perfect, the only thing you can do is try it and try to understand the indredibile end. Another important point, this game hasn't the best graphics of the world, but the work done by the irrational games and Ken Levine with the unrela engine 3 is truly remarkable. My final vote is 9/10.

I'll just add a short note: highly recommended! The game offers extremely beautiful Steampunk graphics and has a nice plot. Sure, it's not that open-worlded as other titles, so you can't leave the road too much, and you probably won't be that much involved or identified with the protagonist like in FC3, but it's really worth playing. The BioShock-Series entered another level and I suggest to play it on an easy level first, otherwise it might lead to frustration :-)

After the amazing gameplay and narrative of the original Bioshock and the fun but forgettable sequel, I thought the franchise had reached its peak with the first entry. However, Biochosk Infinite has probably the greatest story in any game yet, let alone the "shock" series. Where the original had interesting ideas and a shocking second-act revelation, this game expertly manages to hook you from the start and slowly but surely build on its themes throughout a brilliantly-paced campaign and a finale that is mindbending, shocking and heartfelt all at the same time. If you care about storytelling in games at all, this is one the the best examples of a brilliant story that is enhanced by the interactive nature of games. Best game
